summary: This module implements a command‑line utility that scans content files, uses an OpenAI model to generate descriptive front‑matter metadata, and updates the files asynchronously. It includes helpers for building the AI‑generated front‑matter, retrieving available categories, previewing category information, and processing individual or multiple files with progress reporting via Rich.
business_intent: Automate the creation and insertion of AI‑generated descriptive metadata into content files to improve organization, discoverability, and consistency across documentation or publishing pipelines.
